name: Theory (AgentParsec)
description:
(This project was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 49, "Unstable".)

You are Erwin, a cat that has been captured by a race of alien robots, the Drexl'erin.  After weeks of experimentation on you, you've developed the ability to shift between a living and dead state, but only when not being observed.  You must use this power to escape your captors.

Features:

  • Puzzle/action gameplay with a stealth element
  • 5 levels
  • Dynamic music
  • Intro/outro cutscenes

Tools used:

  • Unity 2021.1.23f1 (programming)
  • Aseprite v1.2.29 (pixel art)
  • GIMP 2.10.20 (other art)
  • Reaper v5.983 (music)
  • GoldWave v6.41 (sound effects)
